metadata.name: Aamraah
metadata.description:
This artwork is the first edition 1/1 to the 'Silent Mystique' series that I decided to create.
This piece in particular is an oil painting done on canvas, which was referenced from a 
photograph by Muhammadtaha (@planeteelevene). 

It is my first attempt with hyperrealistic portraiture. The name silent mystique was inspired by the model in the painting (Aamraah). On the image she is displaying a very interesting pose and her striking eyes exudes a rather mysterious and cryptic expression. 

This is one of the most captivating 
paintings I have done, and thus compelled me to create an NFT version of it. So much so that I will be working on a 3 part series!
